Applying a 2-opt pass on the Christofides tour does not give any improvment.
Aplying a 2-opt pass on the NN tour gives substantial improvment.
Below are the tour sequences and costs for the original tours and 2-opt tours.

chris cost 4590.323467352025
2-opt chris cost 4590.323467352025
